attributes.action: To prevent the persecution, expulsion and genocide of the Rohingya people.
attributes.additional_details: This issue must be raised and taken by a state to the International Court of Justice in Hague, for the violation of human rights of a huge number of people and has become a cause for international concern. Aung San Suu Kyi, the Burmese Prime Minister, is ignoring the plight of these people therefore we must take this issue as far as possible to help and stop this genocide.
attributes.background: There is a defeaning silence from international communities regarding the plight of the Rohingya people who have been persecuted for a number of years. Roughly 1.5 million have been expelled from their homes. This must be brought to the attention of the British government and action must be taken.
